predicate.note: Frames file for 'bend' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.6, 26.5, 50, and 45.2; Framenet entries Body movement, Posture, and Path shape. Fortunately all of these fit into a single rolest. I think.

example.name: external causation
example.text: Herb wrinkled his nose with disgust.

example.name: internal causation
example.text: The fabric wrinkled around his ankles.
